trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around December 20th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI see sometimes a blue looking beam come out of some of them.I have found some of them to use a stream,like a time warp of some sort.I'm not out to joke about any of this,I believe they are watching us,changeing our weather in some sort.I have been through a camera,which worked great for alittle while then something happened to it,my cell phone also took the blunge.Somebody needs to see what I have.I believe my photo's can help us understand what is going on,and warn us.
Summary: They have been changeing our weather,hanging mainly around our sun.
